name: Trash Time
description:
Trash Time is a virtual reality game that can teach you how to recycle in a fun way.
Burnt trash accumulates CO2 gas, that is one of the leading causes of global warming.
Try to save the Earth by playing as a alien robot with flexible hands, recycle trash using powerups and power tools.
Make sure that you recycle to the max, the Earth is in stake !

Available power-ups

* Magnet (collects metalic trash automaticaly)
* Compactor (compacts the trash and ensures maximum cash per item)
* Flexible hands (reach the trash without much work)
